definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Their intrusion into our private lives is unwarrantable .
sentences.chinese: 他们侵扰我们的私生活是毫无道理的。

sentences.english: Their wages were reduced or held up for no reason.
sentences.chinese: 他们的工资被毫无道理地降低或扣发。

sentences.english: It is totally unreasonable to make irresponsible accusations against China-Africa energy cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 对中非能源合作妄加指责是毫无道理的。

sentences.english: Toral is also called an Internet “evangelist, ” for good reason.
sentences.chinese: 托拉尔也被称为互联网的“传道者”，这不无道理。

sentences.english: Without Daoism, Daoless culture will emerge.
sentences.chinese: 没有道学也可以产生无道文化。

sentences.english: King Zhou increasingly dissolute without Road, outspoken minister was demoted to remonstrate both killed.
sentences.chinese: 纣王日益荒淫无道，大臣刚直劝谏者皆被杀被贬。

sentences.english: When Tao does not prevail in the world, Even pregnant horses will have to go to battle.
sentences.chinese: 天下无道的时候，怀驹的母马也要上战场。

sentences.english: There was no point in having a permanent enemy among the warders .
sentences.chinese: 在狱吏中树敌是毫无道理的。

sentences.english: After fine goods, is not without reason.
If a man have no a way, none.
So ultimately, I would probably side more with Krugman, but there is some sense in what Roach says.
sentences.chinese: 基本上我更支持克鲁格曼，但罗奇的说法也不无道理。

sentences.english: Jie and Zhou led on the kingdom with violence, and people followed them.
sentences.chinese: 桀和纣带领天下暴虐无道，百姓也就跟随着抢夺作乱。

sentences.english: Many civil wars have degenerated into causeless struggles for power and territory.
sentences.chinese: 许多内战变成毫无道理的权利和土地之争。

sentences.english: Whether teaching is successful or not depends on the essential qualities of the teacher.
sentences.chinese: 教之有道无道，则取决于教师的基本素质的高低。

sentences.english: I know that this doesn't make any sense. I just want you to trust me.
sentences.chinese: 我知道这毫无道理可言，但我只是希望你们相信我。

definition: enlightened sage/brilliant master (flattering words applied to ruler)
to go against the tide (idiom); to do things all wrong/to try to turn back history/a perverse way of doing things
rebels and traitors (idiom)/general term for scoundrel
